Topic.Title: Undefined Game, web editor won't load

Posts.EditableText:
I saved my game and now the web editor is stuck in an infinite loading screen. The game title says "undefined." Is there any way to fix the game so that it will load again?

I saw another post that said that maybe the pov attribute isn't set to "player." How can you change this when you can't load a game on the web editor?
Posts.HTML:
I saved my game and now the web editor is stuck in an infinite loading screen. The game title says "undefined." Is there any way to fix the game so that it will load again?

I saw another post that said that maybe the pov attribute isn't set to "player." How can you change this when you can't load a game on the web editor?

Posts.EditableText: I'm having this same issue. Maybe it's something wrong with the server? At first, my game refreshed and said "Invalid Game ID." Now, the tab says "undefined" and is stuck on permanent loading screen...
Posts.HTML: I'm having this same issue. Maybe it's something wrong with the server? At first, my game refreshed and said "Invalid Game ID." Now, the tab says "undefined" and is stuck on permanent loading screen...

Posts.EditableText: Ok, well, if it might be a server issue then I can wait it out. Were you moving the player object when the editor crashed? Because that's what happened to me.
Posts.HTML: Ok, well, if it might be a server issue then I can wait it out. Were you moving the player object when the editor crashed? Because that's what happened to me.

Posts.EditableText: I wasn't, I was just trying to save the text I had up. Around 10 minutes ago, the game refreshed saying that my session had timed out. When it came back up, half of the saved text on some of my pages was missing, so I re-loaded the game to see if maybe it just got stuck or something? When I re-loaded, it went to "invalid id," so i cleared all my cookies and my cache to see if it would help. it didn't, it just went to the same problem you're having now.
Posts.HTML: I wasn't, I was just trying to save the text I had up. Around 10 minutes ago, the game refreshed saying that my session had timed out. When it came back up, half of the saved text on some of my pages was missing, so I re-loaded the game to see if maybe it just got stuck or something?
